title: There was a Reddit Thread.
body:
I don't post around here much but I thought this was an interesting topic so I'm going to post this. It will be interesting to see what happens with this thread.

Reddit thread- https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/6cxdi6/the_guys_from_riot_anticheat_just_temporarily/

The main details are that someone made a reddit thread about a Rioter that posted a warning on a scripting forums that people using that script would get banned. It was originally thought to be a troll post but people who started playing with this scripting service received almost immediate bans.  You guys can read the reddit thread for more details.

It remains unclear whether this was a direct action approved by riot, or the lone vigilante rioter taking action on his own, but it does seem like riot is cracking down on scripting, and it seems like scripting may be dead in only a matter of time.

So what do you guys think? Will scripting die in the near future or will it never die?

replies.body: It wont stop. Cheating never stops.

It was done directly by a rioter.
The rioter is in the Reddit comments of that thread.
